reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique structural elements (stairs, built-in cabinets, metal roofing) and specific condition tags (狹長格局, 地坪需更新, 牆面嚴重受潮). Descriptions 6 and 7 were confirmed as two views of the same large 2F room (Image_6 and Image_7) due to shared features like the ceiling condition and overall style. Descriptions 8 and 9 were differentiated by their layout (狹長 vs. 較寬) and the specific wall damage mentioned (Image_9 clearly shows severe dampness/peeling, matching Desc_9's '牆面嚴重受潮'). Image_1 was uniquely identified by its extreme narrowness and poor floor condition, matching Desc_1.

matching_result_list.evidence: Matches '一樓狹長空間' and '地坪需更新'. The image shows a long, narrow 1F space with a heavily worn, dark floor.
Clearly depicts a kitchen area with a traditional tiled sink/counter and a door leading to a small bathroom, fulfilling '廚房及衛浴區' and '衛浴內含'.
Represents a square 1F front space ('格局方正') with old, light-colored floor tiles ('地板老舊磁磚').
Features large windows providing '採光良好', built-in low cabinets along the window wall ('內建下方櫃體'), and visible '電線外露' on the side wall.
The only 1F image showing a prominent staircase ('樓梯佔位') and a large built-in wooden display cabinet ('內建大櫃體'), defining the living area.
A large 2F room ('大坪數臥室') featuring extensive built-in storage/wardrobe units ('充足收納') and a visibly damaged drop ceiling ('天花板老化').
A different perspective of the large 2F room (Room B), showing large windows ('採光充足') and additional built-in storage/desk units ('既有收納櫃').
Matches '頂樓加蓋空間A' and '結構簡易鐵皮'. It is a very narrow, long metal structure ('空間狹長') suitable for storage.
Matches '頂樓加蓋空間B'. The image clearly shows a metal structure where the walls exhibit severe peeling and water damage ('牆面嚴重受潮'), and the floor is tiled ('地面已鋪磚').
